data.title: Howard Hughes
data.text:
[1] Hughes claimed his birthday was Christmas Eve, but according to his baptismal records he was actually born on the more mundane date of September 24.

Father: Howard Robard Hughes, Sr. (d. 14-Jan-1924, heart attack)

Mother: Allene Gano (d. 29-Mar-1922)

Wife: Ella Rice (m. 1-Jun-1925, div 9-Dec-1929)

Wife: Terry Moore (secretly m. 1949, according to her)

Wife: Jean Peters (actress, m. 12-Jan-1957, div. 18-Jun-1971)

Wife: Billie Dove

Girlfriend: Carole Lombard

Girlfriend: Marian Marsh

Girlfriend: Ida Lupino

Girlfriend: Lillian Bond

Girlfriend: Mary Rogers

Girlfriend: Nancy Belle Bayly

Girlfriend: Katharine Hepburn

Girlfriend: Ava Gardner

Girlfriend: Yvonne Shubert

Girlfriend: Olivia de Havilland

High School: Thacher School, Ojai, CA

University: California Institute of Technology

University: Rice University

Hughes Electronics

TWA

RKO Radio Pictures

American Airlines copilot for two months, summer 1932

Howard Hughes Medical Institute Founder (1953-)

Young Men's Christian Association joined in his youth

Congressional Gold Medal 1939

National Aviation Hall of Fame 1973

Ticker-Tape Parade 15-Jul-1938

Plane Crash Lake Mead, NV (16-May-1943)

Nervous Breakdown 1944

Plane Crash XF-11 prototype Beverly Hills, CA (7-Jul-1946)

Vasectomy 1955

Nervous Breakdown 1958

Watergate Scandal

Vehicular Manslaughter Los Angeles, CA 11-Jul-1936, no charges filed

Died Intestate

Autopsy

English Ancestry Paternal

French Ancestry Maternal

Welsh Ancestry Paternal

Risk Factors: Insomnia, Syphilis, Mysophobia

FILMOGRAPHY AS DIRECTOR

The Outlaw (5-Feb-1943)

Hell's Angels (27-May-1930)

FILMOGRAPHY AS ACTOR

Tribulation 99: Alien Anomalies Under America (27-Nov-1992) Â· Himself

Howard Hughes
